Department of Housing and Urban Development

awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT WILL PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE DELAWARE NATION OF OKLAHOMA IN ITS EFFORTS TO ADDRESS AIR POLLUTION CONCERNS ON THE NATION'S RESERVATION AND TRIBAL LANDS.  THIS GRANT WILL CONDUCT A LEVEL FOUR EMISSIONS INVENTORY OF AIR SOURCES WITHIN THE NATION'S RESERVATION BOUNDARIES, AND PROVIDE EDUCATION AND OUTREACH TO TRIBAL MEMBERS.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT WILL PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE DELAWARE NATION IN ITS EFFORTS TO ADDRESS AIR POLLUTION CONCERNS ON THE TRIBE'S RESERVATION AND SURROUNDING TRIBAL LANDS IN THE STATE OF OKLAHOMA. THIS GRANT WILL ALLOW THE TRIBE TO BUILD CAPACITY TO BETTER UNDERSTAND AIR QUALITY MANAGEMENT AND AIR MONITORING APPROACHES, CONDUCT INDOOR AIR QUALITY ASSESSMENTS ON TRIBAL MEMBER HOMES, PARTICIPATE IN REGIONAL AND NATIONAL WORK GROUPS, AND PROVIDE EDUCATION AND OUTREACH IN THE COMMUNITY.ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL CONDUCT ACTIVITIES WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THE SECTION 103 AUTHORITY INCLUDING: 1) RESEARCHING TOPICS PERTAINING TO AIR QUALITY TO INCREASE DEPARTMENT'S KNOWLEDGE AND UNDERSTANDING, 2) PARTICIPATION IN TRAINING FOR AIR MONITORING REQUIREMENTS, 3) CONDUCTING 8 TRIBAL MEMBER HOME ASSESSMENTS IN A 15 MILE RADIUS AND PROVIDE INFORMATION, 5) PARTICIPATION IN REGIONAL AND NATIONAL WORK GROUPS, AND 5) PROVIDING EDUCATION AND OUTREACH IN THE COMMUNITY.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE EXPECTED OUTPUTS FROM THIS AGREEMENT ARE INCREASED TRIBAL STAFF CAPACITY THROUGH DOCUMENTED TRAINING, PARTICIPATION IN REGIONAL AND NATIONAL WORK GROUPS, AND EDUCATION AND OUTREACH PROVIDED IN THE COMMUNITY. OUTCOMES INCLUDE A#8239;BROADENED AWARENESS OF AIR QUALITY MANAGEMENT ESTABLISHED TO ADDRESS THE DELAWARE NATION'S AIR SHED AS WELL AS RESEARCH EMERGING THREATS TO PUBLIC HEALTH AND WELFARE FROM AIR POLLUTION, THE REVIEW, RESEARCH, AND ASSESSMENT OF AIR QUALITY CONCERNS. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM INCLUDE THE DELAWARE NATION RESIDENTS WHO WILL HAVE INCREASED KNOWLEDGE OF THE EXPOSURE TO AIR POLLUTANTS IMPACTING THE COMMUNITY.
